title: [K-12] Science Learning Design Utilizing Concept Maps in Simulation/VR Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific terminology comprehension and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to visualize conceptual relationships using VR simulations and digital devices for science graduates preparing for employment.

learning_goals: Learners can structure chemical reaction processes into concept maps in VR environments and explain relationships between core elements
Learners can propose scientific problem-solving solutions by sharing concept maps with peers using collaborative mind tools
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in project-based assessments based on their individual concept map outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
